A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I consider myself an extreme Star Wars fan from the first moment I saw Episode IV. I remember watching the Original Trilogy 47 times straight as a little kid. \nThen Episode IIIV happened. Confused me so bad. I'm still scratching my head as to why the critics are giving this a 90% rating. What the (censored). I completely lost interest in these new characters that were introduced in The Force Awakens. The visuals were awesome and I loved how I saw Luke Skywalker for more than 10 SECONDS\, but that was about it. If you are interested in seeing intimate hand touches\, bad out-of-placed jokes\, and disappointment from well-loved characters\, here's your movie.
